Move1.Name: Gyro Ball
Move1.Effects: The target reveals their Speed Stat (including Combat Stages). If it is higher than the user's (including Combat Stages), subtract the user's Speed Stat from the target's and apply the difference as Bonus Damage.

Move2.Name: Iron Defense
Move2.Effects: Raise the user's Defense by +2 CS.

Move3.Name: Mirror Shot
Move3.Effects: All Legal Targets have their Accuracy lowered by -2 on 16+.

Move4.Name: Ingrain
Move4.Effects: Ingrain applies a Coat to the user, which has the following effect; the user cannot be pushed or pulled, and cannot be switched out. At the beginning of each of the user's turn, the user gains HP equal to 1/10th of its max HP.

Move5.Name: Self-Destruct
Move5.Effects: The user's HP is set to -50% of its full HP. This HP loss may not be prevented or reduced in any way. The user's loyalty may be lowered.

Move7.Name: Iron Head
Move7.Effects: Iron Head Flinches the target on 15+.

Ability1.Name: Iron Barbs
Ability1.Trigger: The user is hit by a damaging Melee Attack
Ability1.Info: The attacker loses Hit Points equal to Tick of Hit Points.

Ability2.Name: Battle Armor
Ability2.Info: The user is immune to Critical Hits; they are instead normal hits. Defensive.

Ability3.Name: Analytic
Ability3.Info: Whenever the user targets uses a damaging Move on a Pok√©mon or Trainer that has acted before it during Initiative this Round, that Move deals an additional +5 Damage.
